page.title: 15BELL RINGING IN RISELEY
page.content: In Riseley Church tower there are 5 bells which were rehung for change ringing in the new frame work in 1973. For th following 8 or 9 years a full team could be heard ringing every week. Now however due to people leaving the village and/or losing interest there are very few ringers and,although a team can be found for special occasions such as weddings and christmas,there is no regular team to ring on Sundays for the church services. At the present time there is a move afoot to try to start a regular practice night again and get a competent team of change ringers. Once the bells are heard ringing again it may arouse an interest in the people near to the village to have a go at ringing and swell the numbers of the team of ringers.
